channel.title: Teleporting locations

item.title: Teleporting locations
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well…
sendOption3 requires you to have it in this format:
sendOption3(String, String, String);

and if you actually want it to teleport you need to add the teleport to it…

Read full topic

item.title: Teleporting locations
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:9, topic:522558”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=641062.msg4319523#msg4319523 date=1372034218]
What? I just told you how to…
[/quote]

to do it would it be something like this
case 666:
sendOption3(“KBD”);
c.dialogueAction = 317;
break;

ClickingButton’s:

case 8008135:
if(c.dialogueAction == 317){
c.sendMessage(“You have teleported to KBD”);
}
break;[/quote]
Yes, exactly what he said before.

item.title: Teleporting locations
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:522558”][quote author=u loose link=topic=641062.msg4319062#msg4319062 date=1371970442]

it teles me there but it doesnt
What?

i ment, when i click the teleport option nothing happens

So add a dialogue action, the add cases to the clicking button for the clicking ID, and have it teleport based off the dialogue action

would you be able to show me a example of what you mean?
cause honestly, i dont know how to do that…
[/quote]
dialogueHandler:

case 666:
sendOption3(“I’m Bad At”, “Coding So I Ask For”, “Help All The Time”);
c.dialogueAction = 317;
break;

ClickingButton’s:

case 8008135:
if(c.dialogueAction == 317){
c.sendMessage(“Noob Stop Asking Questions And Teleport Already”);
}
break;

And so on.

No, this was not directed at you.[/quote]

say for example i click “boss teleport” then kbd i want it to teleport me there.
but when i click kbd nothing happens.

so would i need a dialogue for that when im not talking to a npc

Read full topic

item.title: Teleporting locations
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

so i have tried numerous times and i still cant.
what i want it when i click the teleport option eg. barrow it teles me there but it doesnt, nothing happens.
this is my clickingbuttons.java teleport x y’s

[code]case 9190:
if (c.teleAction == 2) {
//barrows
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3565, 3314, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 1) {
//kalphite queen
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3488, 9493, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
//
//mining
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3046,9779,0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 20) {
//lum
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3222, 3218, 0);//3222 3218
}

			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2845, 4832, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {

				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2398, 4841, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;
			case 988:
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3213,3457,0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			break;
		
			//mining - 3046,9779,0
		//smithing - 3079,9502,0
		//2nd tele option
		case 9191:
			if (c.teleAction == 1) {
				//pest control
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2662, 2650, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				//kbd
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2273, 4681, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
				//fishing
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2611,3398,0);
				//varrock
			} else if (c.teleAction == 20) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3210,3424,0);//3210 3424
			}
			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2796, 4818, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2527, 4833, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2464, 4834, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;

		case 9192:
			if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				//Fight caves
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2444, 5178, 0);
				c.sendMessage("@red@Enter the cave to begin your Journey to the firecape.");
			} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
				//dag kings
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(4644, 2515, 0);
				c.sendMessage("Climb down the ladder to get into the lair.");
			} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2597,3408,0);
			}
			 else if (c.teleAction == 20) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2757,3477,0);
			}

			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2713, 4836, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2162, 4833, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2207, 4836, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;
		//4th tele option
		case 9193:
			if (c.teleAction == 1) {
				//duel arena
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3366, 3266, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
				//chaos elemental
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3295, 3921, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 4) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2724,3484,0);
				c.sendMessage("For magic logs, try north of the duel arena.");
			}
			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2660, 4839, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				//c.getPA().spellTeleport(2527, 4833, 0); astrals here
				c.getRunecrafting().craftRunes(2489);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				//c.getPA().spellTeleport(2464, 4834, 0); bloods here
				c.getRunecrafting().craftRunes(2489);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			
			} else if (c.teleAction == 20) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2964,3378,0);
			}
			break;
		//5th tele option
		case 9194:
			if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				//last minigame spot
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2095,4428,0);
				//c.getPA().closeAllWindows();
			} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2717,9801,0);
				c.sendMessage("You teleport to tormented demons.");
				c.getPA().closeAllWindows();
			} else if (c.teleAction == 4) {
				c.dialogueId = 50;
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2812,3463,0);
			}
			if (c.dialogueAction == 10 || c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.dialogueId++;
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.dialogueId = 17;
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);
			
			} else if (c.teleAction == 20) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3506,3496,0);
			}
			break;[/code]

[code]//home teleports
